Summary

I learned to code because I was inspired by the work of my bookkeeping clients. The programmers I contracted for were doing challenging and intense work, building products that impact thousands of people. I wanted to do that too, so I studied web development through an online program. I am an exceptionally dedicated and dependable team player, looking to secure a Full Stack Developer position where I can use my educational background to develop my skills.
